CustomField.formula: TEXT( DAY(Date__c) ) & "/" & CASE(MONTH(Date__c), 1, "Jan", 2, "Feb", 3, "Mar", 4, "Apr", 5, "May", 6, "Jun", 7, "Jul", 8, "Aug", 9, "Sep", 10, "Oct", 11, "Nov", "Dec") & "/" & TEXT( YEAR(Date__c) ) & IF( Seats_Available_Morning__c > 0, " - Morning YES ", " - Morning NO ") & IF( Seats_Available_Afternoon__c > 0, " - Afternoon YES", " - Afternoon NO")
CustomField.label: Date Concat
